name: Jotter
0:
”Alexa, ask my Jotter to save meeting with john today”
”Alexa, ask my Jotter when is meeting with John”
”Alexa, ask my Jotter to list events for today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my jotter
des:
Here comes the Jotter to make your event management easy! Store, retrieve and remove any kind of events just by commanding him.

Jotter helps you in saving and retrieving any kind of events like, birthdays of family and friends, meeting, dating, etc. To save any event, you have to say "save the date" and then follow the prompts to enter event type, date and name of the person. You can retrieve the any event just by asking, "when is the {Event Type} of/with {Name of person}". Also you can delete saved events, saying "remove the {Event Type} of/with {name of person}".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
